title: Device
introduction: Ambient is a device aimed at people who care about their health. Its wide range of features supports systematic medicine adherence. The simplicity and robust design facilitate the transportation of Ambient with ease. Despite its small size, it can hold a monthly supply of medicines. The intuitive user interface and simple handling provide convenient and effective treatment management. Thanks to the web and mobile applications, caregivers and doctors can remotely assess the progress of treatment.

system.title: Modular design
system.description: All of your medicines are in one place, no need to put them in one by one.

loading.title: Fast refill
loading.description: A few seconds is all you need to replace one of the containers.

record.title: Adherence record
record.description: Thanks to the LED panel, you can see your daily progress. There are more adherence details available in our application.

reminders.title: Reminders
reminders.description: Thanks to the audio-visual notifications on the device and in our app, there is no need to remember when to take medicines.

system.title: Schedule
system.description: Your medicines are neatly placed in the containers, ready to be issued at the appropriate time.

urgent.title: Urgent access
urgent.description: Fast access to select medicines in urgent situations.

size.title: Handy size
size.description: Small dimensions allow carrying this device in one hand. Despite its compact size, the box is capable of accomodating an average home medicine cabinet, thanks to its modular design.

finish.title: Modern finish
finish.description: Minimalistic and aesthetic appearance enables it to seamlessly blend into any interior.
